Q

query() - Method in class gov.bnl.shift.ShiftResource
GET method for retrieving a collection of shift instances, based on a multi-parameter query specifiying patterns, id, from-to startDate or owner name Only allow one date from the from and to query, if multiple dates appear on the url, the first ones will be the ones to use "*" will be used as a wild card to retrive all the shifts
